sources.title: El Arracadas(1978)
sources.description: A young man arrives home to an assassinated father. His mother makes him promise to take vengeance upon the murderer of his father giving him an earring of which he is nicknamed "el arracadas". Upon swearing to take revenge, he goes out in the hunt for his father's killer taking anyone down in his way.

metadata.Plot: A young man arrives home to an assassinated father. Upon swearing to take revenge, he goes out in the hunt for his father's killer taking anyone down in his way.
metadata.Actors: Vicente Fernández, Mario Almada, Roberto Cañedo
